name: JupyterLab
description: JupyterLab is the next-generation interface for Project Jupyter. Compared with the classic Notebook it offers a multi-tab workspace, built-in file browser, terminals, extensible plugin system, and first-party Git integration for version control - all in one browser window.

notes.text: To get the token to access JupyterLab, run the following command: jupyter lab list.
